item.title: List of DevOps GitHub Projects
item.description: Command Line bat - a cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration Pueue - command-line task management tool for sequential and parallel execution of long-running tasks specctl - command-line based tool to extract and transform Kubernetes objects to ECS and vice versa Kubernetes k9s - terminal UI to interact with your Kubernetes clusters Scheduling Airflow - platform to programmatically author, schedule, and monitor workflows Dkron - distributed, fault tolerant job scheduling system for cloud native environments
item.content:encoded:
Command Line

  • bat - a cat clone with syntax highlighting and Git integration
  • Pueue - command-line task management tool for sequential and parallel execution of long-running tasks
  • specctl - command-line based tool to extract and transform Kubernetes objects to ECS and vice versa

Kubernetes

  • k9s - terminal UI to interact with your Kubernetes clusters

Scheduling

  • Airflow - platform to programmatically author, schedule, and monitor workflows
  • Dkron - distributed, fault tolerant job scheduling system for cloud native environments
